RelatedSentence: Canada strongly condemns the attacks carried out in Tripoli this weekend .
We call on all parties to refrain from violence and to work together to de-escalate the situation and engage in a peaceful democratic process .
We continue to support a peaceful political transition and encourage efforts to hold a national dialogue .
